pages.text: Every player has a $(3)Spectre Energy buffer$() which acts sort of $(3)like an Ender Chest, but for FE$() instead of items.$(br2)By default, this pool can store up to 1,000,000 FE. This amount can be changed in the server config.
pages.title: Spectre Energy Injector

pages.text: The $(d)Spectre Energy Injector$() allows you to $(3)insert FE into the pool$(). It's owned by whoever placed it.$(br2)You $(c)cannot extract from the Injector$(). You'll have to use a $(l:blocks/spectre_coil_basic)Spectre Coil$(/l) or a $(l:items/spectre_charger_basic)Spectre Charger$(/l) to do that.
